questions.question: 2. In simulator, the transfer of electrons in MFC is denoted by

answers.b: Glowing of the electric bulb in the MFC

questions.question: 3. When Caulobacter crescentus, is used as electrogen in MFC simulator, which of the following combination of electrodes produced maximum output

answers.a: Aluminum as anode and copper as cathode

questions.question: 4. In the simulator, do you observe variance in the voltage at which maximum current can be obtained with respect to different electrode combinations.
5. After working the simulator, which PEM can be a best for Caulobacter crescentus to perform exoelectrogenesis?

answers.d: No PEM needed for Caulobacter crescentus.
